mapper.insert: insert into `myBoard` (title, content, writer,regDate,password) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now(), #{password})
mapper.select: select bno, title, writer, regDate from myBoard order by bno desc
select * from( select * from myBoard order by bno asc ) myBoard limit 0, 10
select count(bno) from myBoard where bno > 0
